definitions.definition: To feel fear about (something or someone); to be afraid of; to consider or expect with alarm.
definitions.example: I fear the worst will happen.
Never fear; help is always near.

definitions.definition: (used with for) To worry about, to feel concern for, to be afraid for.
definitions.example: She fears for her son’s safety.

definitions.definition: To venerate; to feel awe towards.
definitions.example: People who fear God can be found in Christian churches.
I fear I have bad news for you: your husband has died.

definitions.definition: To cause fear to; to frighten.
To be anxious or solicitous for.
Pertaining to someone or thing that causes great fear in others.
